p: A subsection of the corpus (n = 5) deals with localization of SDG targets, resolving tradeoffs, and ensuring synergies and benefits. Four out of five of these articles provide in-depth analysis of relationships between various SDG goals and targets and adaptation (Reed et al., 2018; Glass and Newig, 2019, Orchard et al., 2019, Valencia et al., 2019), which will be outlined below. The limited literature on these fields implies that there is a knowledge gap on how to methodologically and theoretically link advancements in approaching SDGs in the co-production for adaptation literature.
